summary: The kindly story-teller Uncle Remus tells a young boy stories about trickster Br'er Rabbit, who outwits Br'er Fox and slow-witted Br'er Bear.
cast: Ruth Warrick|Bobby Driscoll|James Baskett|Luana Patten|Lucile Watson|Hattie McDaniel|Erik Rolf|Glenn Leedy|Mary Field|Anita Brown|Georgie Nokes|Gene Holland|Nick Stewart|Johnny Lee|Babette De Castro|Cherie De Castro|Peggy De Castro|Roy Glenn|Clarence Nash
